pageSize.description: Number of items included in the page

clusterGroupUuid.description:
If specified, alert occurs only when export SQL result data on this connection.
Required if connectionSelectAll is false

intervalMinutes.description:
The interval in minutes for triggering an alert.
If set to `0`, the alert is based solely on the row count, ignoring the time interval.

rows.description: An alert occurs if exported data row count is greater than or equal to this value.

selectAll.description: If true, alert is occurs when export SQL result data on all DB Connections.

clusterGroupUuid.description:
If specified, alert occurs only when attempt to connect to this DB connection.
Required if connectionSelectAll is false

condition.description: DB connection attempt result status that create a alert.

selectAll.description: If true, alert is created for all DB connection attempt.

clusterGroupUuid.description:
Connection-uuid to send alert when attempted Prevented Query
Required if connectionSelectAll is true

messageTemplate.example: {{userName}} executed {{sqlType}} statement with a restricted access.

selectAll.description: If true, alert occurs when running Prevented SQL on all DB connections

If set to `0`, the alert is based solely on the row count, ignoring the time interval.

rows.description: An alert occurs if query result row count is greater than or equal to this value.
